verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: During the TIME 100 Gala on Tuesday night] , [ARG0: Congresswoman Maxine Waters] [V: had] [ARG1: a very simple request for President Trump] and she got straight to the point .
During the TIME 100 Gala on Tuesday night , Congresswoman Maxine Waters had a very simple request for President Trump and [ARG1: she] [V: got] [ARG2: straight to the point] .
